verses.verse: And the man<WH120> knew<WH3045> Eve<WH2332> his wife<WH802>; and she conceived<WH2029>, and bare<WH3205> Cain<WH7014>, and said<WH559>, I have gotten<WH7069> a man<WH376> with the help<WH854> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
And again<WH3254> she bare<WH3205> his brother<WH251> Abel<WH1893>. And Abel<WH1893> was a keeper<WH7462> of sheep<WH6629>, but Cain<WH7014> was a tiller<WH5647> of the ground<WH127>.
And in process<WH7093> of time<WH3117> it came to pass<WH7014>, that Cain brought<WH935> of the fruit<WH6529> of the ground<WH127> an offering<WH4503> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

And Abel<WH1893>, he<WH1931> also brought<WH935> of the firstlings<WH1062> of his flock<WH6629> and of the fat<WH2459> thereof<WH3068>. And Jehovah had respect<WH8159> unto Abel<WH1893> and to his offering<WH4503>:
but unto Cain<WH7014> and to his offering<WH4503> he had not respect<WH8159>. And Cain<WH7014> was very<WH3966> wroth<WH2734>, and his countenance<WH6440> fell<WH5307>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Cain<WH7014>, Why art thou wroth<WH2734>? and why is thy countenance<WH6440> fallen<WH5307>?

If <WH518> thou doest well<WH3190>, shall it not be lifted<WH7613> up<WH3190>? and if thou doest not well, sin<WH2403> coucheth<WH7257> at the door<WH6607>; and unto thee shall be its desire<WH8669>; but do thou rule over it<WH4910>.

And Cain<WH7014> told<WH559> Abel<WH1893> his<WH413> brother<WH251>. And it came to pass<WH7704>, when they were in the field, that Cain<WH7014> rose up<WH6965> against<WH413> Abel<WH1893> his brother<WH251>, and slew him<WH2026>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Cain<WH7014>, Where<WH335> is Abel<WH1893> thy brother<WH251>? And he said<WH559>, I know<WH3045> not<WH251>: am I my brother's keeper<WH8104>?
And he said<WH559>, What<WH4100> hast thou done<WH6213>? the voice<WH6963> of thy brother<WH251>'s blood<WH1818> crieth<WH6817> unto me from the ground<WH127>.
And now cursed<WH779> art thou from the ground<WH127>, which hath opened<WH6475> its mouth<WH6310> to receive<WH3947> thy brother<WH251>'s blood<WH1818> from thy hand<WH3027>;

when <WH3588> thou tillest<WH5647> the ground<WH127>, it shall not henceforth<WH3254> yield<WH5414> unto thee its strength<WH3581>; a fugitive<WH5128> and a wanderer<WH5110> shalt thou be in the earth<WH776>.
And Cain<WH7014> said<WH559> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, My punishment<WH5771> is greater<WH1419> than I can bear<WH5375>.

Behold <WH1644>, thou hast driven me out this day<WH3117> from the face<WH6440> of the ground<WH127>; and from<WH5921> thy face<WH6440> shall I be hid<WH5641>; and I shall be a fugitive<WH5128> and a wanderer<WH5110> in the earth<WH776>; and it will come to pass<WH1961>, that whosoever findeth me<WH2026> will slay me<WH2026>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto him<WH3651>, Therefore whosoever slayeth<WH2026> Cain<WH7014>, vengeance shall be taken<WH5358> on him sevenfold<WH7659>. And Jehovah<WH3068> appointed<WH7760> a sign<WH226> for Cain<WH7014>, lest<WH1115> any finding<WH4672> him should smite him<WH5221>.
And Cain<WH7014> went out<WH3318> from the presence<WH6440> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and dwelt<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Nod<WH5113>, on the east<WH6926> of Eden<WH5731>.

And Cain<WH7014> knew<WH3045> his wife<WH802>; and she conceived<WH2029>, and bare<WH3205> Enoch<WH2585>: and he builded<WH1129> a city<WH5892>, and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892>, after the name<WH8034> of his son<WH1121>, Enoch<WH2585>.

And unto Enoch<WH2585> was born<WH3205> Irad<WH5897>: and Irad<WH5897> begat<WH3205> Mehujael<WH4232>; and Mehujael<WH4232> begat<WH3205> Methushael<WH4967>; and Methushael<WH4967> begat<WH3205> Lamech<WH3929>.
And Lamech<WH3929> took<WH3947> unto him two<WH8147> wives<WH802>: the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Adah<WH5711>, and the name<WH8034> of the other<WH8145> Zillah<WH6741>.
And Adah<WH5711> bare<WH3205> Jabal<WH2989>: he was the father<WH1> of such as dwell<WH3427> in tents<WH168> and have cattle<WH4735>.
And his brother<WH251>'s name<WH8034> was Jubal<WH3106>: he was the father<WH1> of all such as handle<WH8610> the harp<WH3658> and pipe<WH5748>.

And Zillah<WH6741>, she also bare<WH3205> Tubal-cain<WH8423>, the forger<WH3913> of every cutting instrument<WH2794> of brass<WH5178> and iron<WH1270>: and the sister<WH269> of Tubal-cain<WH8423> was Naamah<WH5279>.

And Lamech<WH3929> said<WH559> unto his wives<WH802>: Adah<WH5711> and Zillah<WH6741>, hear<WH8085> my voice<WH6963>; Ye wives<WH802> of Lamech<WH3929>, hearken<WH238> unto my speech<WH565>: For I have slain<WH2026> a man<WH376> for wounding<WH6482> me<WH3206>, And a young man for bruising me<WH2250>:
If <WH3588> Cain<WH7014> shall be avenged<WH5358> sevenfold<WH7659>, Truly Lamech<WH3929> seventy<WH7657> and sevenfold<WH7651>.

And Adam<WH120> knew<WH3045> his wife<WH802> again<WH5750>; and she bare<WH3205> a son<WH1121>, and called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Seth<WH8352>: For<WH430>, said she, God hath appointed<WH7896> me another<WH312> seed<WH2233> instead<WH8478> of Abel<WH1893>; for Cain<WH7014> slew<WH2026> him<WH3588>.

And to Seth<WH8352>, to him<WH1931> also there was born<WH3205> a son<WH1121>; and he called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Enosh<WH583>. Then began men<WH2490> to call<WH7121> upon the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
